versionName:
* Multi-Monitor Mouse Movement mode fix
* Launch via non standard target fix
* Viewport FPS Optimization when moving via Gadget
* Viewport FPS Limit Option
* Disable Render Option
* ShadowFNT & AFS Integration for HintBall/TriggerTalking
* HPP will now remember the main window size last used
* Shadow ProximityDoor now draw detect range when clicked
* Shadow Triggers now draw ranges, with an optional disable toggle
* Shadow Spline Editor Sec5Bytes Editing Fixed
* Many Shadow Objects now render models more accurately
* Delete and Rename Hotkeys for Level Editor Geometry & Shadow Collision
* Batch Rename for MAT flags in Level Editor
* Shadow Camera Editor
* Misc Heroes Object fixes by Muzzarino
* .NET Framework HPP version Dropped

New Version Requires .NET 6
